import React, { Component } from 'react' import IMG2 from '../images/echallenge.JPG' export default class Project3 extends Component { componentDidMount() { document.title = "Vivien Geschwind | Gig economy platform: unifi" window.scrollTo(0,0) } render() { return (

A gig economy platform: unifi

P r o j e c t   o v e r v i e w

unifi was created as part of the JIBS Entrepreneurship Challenge 2020.

R o l e
Designer, Developer

T o o l s
Figma, Android Studio

D u r a t i o n
30th March - 1st April 2020

{/*
User Research, UI Design, Prototyping, Testing */}

B a c k g r o u n d

P r o c e s s

{/*

The project was carried out in four phases:

  • E m p a t h i s e
    Here I conducted semi-structured user interviews to learn more about the pain points users faced when using spexor in a B2B context.
  • D e f i n e
    After gathering user insights, I analysed the results of the interviews and translated them into requirements. I categorised the requirements into larger epics and prioritised them according to their severity.
  • P r o t o t y p e
    Based on the most severe requirements, I did some sketching and designed high-fidelity wireframes. Finally, I implemented an interactive iPad prototype using Xcode Storyboards.
  • T e s t
    Here I tested the prototype with users using a think-aloud approach to receive feedback and refine the requirements for a next notional iteration.
*/}

R e s u l t s

We won the 1st place of the challenge.

» A n   i m m e d i a t e   a n d   s i m p l e   s o l u t i o n   t o   b r i n g   r e l i e f,   b y   c o m b i n i n g   c o m m u n i t y   b u i l d i n g   w i t h   t h e   p o w e r   o f   s o l i d a r i t y   a n d   t h e   g i g   e c o n o m y «

Read more about the challenge here

) } }
